headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Misses Q3 Earnings Estimates
summary: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -3.22% and +16.33%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Marathon Petroleum (MPC) Misses Q3 Earnings Estimates

headline: Marathon Petroleum: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: FINDLAY, Ohio (AP) — Marathon Petroleum Corp. MPC) on Tuesday reported third-quarter net income of $1.37 billion. On a per-share basis, the Findlay, Ohio-based company said it had profit of $4.51.

raw.headline: Marathon Petroleum: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: FINDLAY, Ohio (AP) — Marathon Petroleum Corp. MPC) on Tuesday reported third-quarter net income of $1.37 billion. On a per-share basis, the Findlay, Ohio-based company said it had profit of $4.51.

headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. Elects Maryann T. Mannen as Chairman of the Board
summary: Marathon Petroleum Corp. (NYSE: MPC) today announced that the board of directors of MPC has elected Maryann T. Mannen, president and chief executive officer and member of the board of directors, as chairman of the board, effective Jan. 1, 2026. Mannen will assume the role of chairman of the board in addition to her current responsibilities. Mannen will succeed Michael J. Hennigan, who has elected to retire as executive chairman and as a member of the board of directors, also effective Jan. 1, 20
